thread.section_title: Chelsea Pines Inn - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Interesting Little Place
thread.title_full: Interesting Little Place - Review of Chelsea Pines Inn, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Greg G
title: Interesting Little Place
text:
I really just heard about this place directly thru tripadvisor. At one time I think it was 1 overall for NYC, WOW! I do see how it is able to stand out. Just the decor and theme of this place is wacky and fun mixed with high quality product. You know the city is gonna be expensive, so might as well pick a place that makes you happy. This did that and more. Love the staff too!
I hope my travels bring me back to your hotel.
